quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Husband and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, biochemist, abc. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This TV character and her spouse Tim The Tool Man were the parents of  Brad, Randy and Mark.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jill Taylor

questions.question: This TV mom and her husband Cliff live in in Brooklyn, New York with their kids Sondra, Denise, Theo, Vanessa and Rudy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Claire Huxtable

questions.question: This TV mom and her husband John struggle to live a decent life during the Great Depression and the Second World War, taking care of their seven kids, John Boy, Mary Ellen, Jason, Erin, Ben, Jim Bob and Elizabeth.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Olivia Walton

questions.question: The sci-fi-based sitcom Mork and Mindy was a spinoff from the 70s show Happy Days.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Ralph Malph, the chracter from Happy Days who left with Richie to join the army, was played by which actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donny Most

questions.question: What year did the popular sitcom Happy Days first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1974

questions.question: This bossy and dominant TV character and her easy-going husband Dan have three children, Becky, Darlene, and DJ.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roseanne Conner

questions.question: This TV character, who is a trained biochemist, and her husband John are the parents of  Judy, Penny and Will.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maureen Robinson

questions.question: On the ABC show Happy Days, Richie got married to Lori Beth, who was portrayed by which actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lynda Goodfriend

questions.question: This hard-working TV mother and her husband James took care of their three children, J. J., Thelma and Michael.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Florida Evans

questions.question: What was the last name of Chachi, the character from Happy Days, who eventually married Joanie Cunningham?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arcola

questions.question: Which TV sharp-tongued widow had a son, named Vinton?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thelma Harper

questions.question: This TV mom and her husband Hal are the parents of Francis, Reese, Malcom, Dewey and Jamie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lois Wilkerson

questions.question: What high school did the gang from the sitcom Happy Days attend?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jefferson

questions.question: What was the name of Fonzies girlfriend, portrayed on the show Happy days by actress Roz Kelly?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pinky

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Brady Bunch and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, design. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who played the role of the blond waitress Diane Chambers in the 80s TV series Cheers?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On the sitcom Cheers, actress Rhea Perlman played the role of Carla. What was Carlas last name?

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Catchphrase and Ray
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, college, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What indiscretion does Deborah commit during college that ended up on the front page of the paper?

options.text: She went to a nude beach.
She got arrested for lewd behavior.
She got topless at Mardi Gras.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She got topless at Mardi Gras.

questions.question: Where did Frank say he learned to play ping pong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In Korea, during the war.

questions.question: When Raymond is seen swing dancing at a club, what does a woman comment that may be wrong with him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An inner ear problem.

questions.question: What did Robert get Amy for their first Valentines Day together.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iguana

questions.question: This show, set in Chicago, featured a character who used the catchphrase Dyn-o-mite.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Good Times

questions.question: What was Roberts ex-wifes name as an exotic dancer in Atlantic City?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cinnamon

questions.question: Who does Ray get into a fight with when he takes Allie to sell Campfire Girl Cookies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Troop leader, Peggy

questions.question: After Marie drives the car into Ray and Deborahs house, why does Ray get so upset when it is repaired?

options.text: Deborah doesnt think it looks the same as before.
The stripes on the new wallpaper are different.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The stripes on the new wallpaper are different.

questions.question: How did Robert get injured on the job?

options.text: He was attacked by a rabid dog.
He was gored by a bull.
He was shot during a robbery.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was gored by a bull.

questions.question: Godll get you for that was the catchphrase of Edith Bunkers cousin who appeared on which of these shows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maude

questions.question: Amy has one brother, but he has been called two different names.  He is mentioned and seen once in an early season. In later seasons he appears with a different name.  What are the two names he has been referred to as?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: B. Peter  Russell

questions.question: After Deborahs parents divorce, they visit for Thanksgiving.  What does Ray witness that creeps him out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warren  Lois in bed together.

questions.question: Where was Deborah working when she met Raymond?

options.text: At the Hunt, Rogers and Snyder law firm.
At The Charlotte Sterling Advertising Agency.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: For the New York Rangers.

questions.question: This TV cartoon character used the catchphrase HEY HEY HEY starting in 1972.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fat Albert

questions.question: Danger, Will Robinson was heard each week on this science fiction show back in 1965.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lost in Space
